Article.Author: By Everyone
Article.Title: Thoughts Within the Void
Article.Text:
Airy: Over what seemed like months, as if we could send our thoughts through a medium, DaDarkWizard and I communicated with each other. We were able to bring our thoughts together and images formed in our mind.
DaDarkWizard: We need eyes before we can see, ears before we can hear. The ability to touch and feel before finding things to touch and feel.
Airy: What would a grassland sound like? Would there be danger? I tried to be encouraging and keep things moving forward. Things could only go up, or down, or somewhere else!
DaDarkWizard: Everything shall be a node, even the grass beneath our feet. Panes to hold their children, buttons to click, sprites to move around. It will be a structured creation.
Airy: Nodes, Panes, Buttons, Sprites? I didn’t understand what all this would mean or do, but if we could put all this together, we could get… someplace! And reach these echoing thoughts through the bleakness.
It’sJohn: This is too much for me!!!
Joy: Sprites will appear when needed!
DaDarkWizard: Is this a premonition of what's to come? Or a simple faltering in the iron-wrought plans for the future? Only time shall tell. But no matter, I will forge on.
